about_the_game:
Can you be in the right place at the right time to stop the puck?


Cover your angles properly against increasingly strong forward attackers. They will skate faster and shoot a meaner puck as you climb levels. If you can not be there in time, you have a bunch of tools in your arsenal to help you extend your reach.



Left Pad Save


A powerful tool that always takes the opponent by surprise. There is a 5% stamina cost associated with this sneaky move.



Right Pad Save


Another surprisingly effective tool that is very similar to the Left Pad Save. There is also a 5% stamina cost associated with this move.



Butterfly Save


You can eventually unlock this beauty of a show-stopper, or puck-stopper if you prefer... This elegant yet powerful tool is one of your best assets. Keep in mind that this insanely acrobatic save will set you back by 10% stamina.



The Super Stacked Pads Power Slide


Yes! You read that right. You will be able to unlock this baby after a lot of work - it's worth it. If the puck gets to where you should be before you do, turn on the jets, stack them pads and fly to your destination before the opponent knows what happened. You'll be tired after that as your stamina will take a 25% hit.









Your stamina regenerates over time but you do have another weapon in your tool belt to help you out. Actually, it sits on your net behind you. Your water bottle is filled with a special, very potent, fruit, veggie, and maple syrup juice mix.



You must manage your stamina from level to level as it does not reset when you start a new level. Your bottle, on the other hand, will be refilled at the beginning of each level. There is enough juice in the bottle to refill your stamina bar, once.





Accumulate more points by avoiding the use of your Pad Saves.

  • Get 5 points for a normal save.
  • Get 4 points if you use your Left or Right Pad Saves
  • Get 3 points if you use the special Butterfly or Super Stacked Pad Saves.

With some Pad Saves, you open up a little five-hole... So be careful. On the rare occasions when the attacker misses and hits the post, the referee will give you the save, but you will only collect 1 point.

Keep track of your performance and see how you stack up against your friends and the world's best goalies!




  • A fun Top-down view
  • Simple easy to learn controls
  • Unlockable Abilities
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Stats
  • Steam Leaderboard
  • Cloud Saves
